import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import LocationOnIcon from'@mui/icons-material/LocationOn';import'./css/style.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TempApp=()=>{const[city,setCity]=useState(null);const[search,setSearch]=useState('');// Initialize with an empty string
useEffect(()=>{const fetchApi=async()=>{if(search){const url=`http://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${search}&appid=cd308c630815620a70414e48f3205bde&units=metric`;const response=await fetch(url);const resJson=await response.json();if(resJson.main){setCity(resJson);}else{setCity(null);}}};fetchApi();},[search]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"inputData",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"search",className:"inputField",value:search,onChange:event=>setSearch(event.target.value)})}),!city?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No data found"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"location",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LocationOnIcon,{})}),city.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"temp",children:[city.main.temp,"\xB0C"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"tempin_max",children:["Min: ",city.main.temp_min,"\xB0C | Max: ",city.main.temp_max,"\xB0C"]})]})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"waves wave-one"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"waves wave-two"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"waves wave-three"})]});};export default TempApp;
